articles.title: Hong Kong retail sales drop 23.6% in November as protests persist
articles.description: Hong Kong retail sales extended their free-fall in November as months of anti-government protests scared off tourists, hitting spending and threatening the survival of small businesses.
articles.content:
HONG KONG (Reuters) - Hong Kong retail sales extended their free-fall in November as months of anti-government protests scared off tourists, hitting spending and threatening the survival of small businesses.
